title: if i get demoted now..
body: IF i get demoted right now in preseason will i still receive my silver Border? since its preseason idk if i can still play rank bcuz I'm at 0 lp.. i wouldn't wanna get demoted to bronze n not receive anything..

replies.body: Nah, season's over, you're fine. You can't get demoted anymore. When the new season rolls around you'll have to do your placements and get a new ranking. Playing ranked now just determines where you'll start when doing those. So they don't get diamonds smashing bronzies, you know?

> You can't get demoted anymore.

As a note, you CAN get demoted, it just only counts for the preseason.
